select sql_calc_found_rows *, if(start_at <= now(), true, false) as started, if(end_at <= now(), true, false) as ended from contest
where start_at <= now()
limit #{start}, #{limit}; select found_rows()

select sql_calc_found_rows cp.*, result from contest_problem cp left join (select user_id, problem_id, contest_id, min(result - 1) result from judge_result where user_id = #{userId} group by user_id, problem_id, contest_id) jr on cp.contest_id = jr.contest_id and cp.problem_id = jr.problem_id
select sql_calc_found_rows * from contest_problem cp
join contest c on cp.contest_id = c.contest_id and c.start_at <= now()
where cp.contest_id = #{contestId} limit #{start}, #{limit}; select found_rows()

select sql_calc_found_rows * from problem where problem_id not in (select problem_id from contest_problem where contest_id = #{contestId}) and enable = false limit #{start}, #{limit}; select found_rows()
mapper.insert: insert into contest(contest_name, start_at, end_at, languages) value (#{contestName}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{languages})
